DOC.detailed_description: The primary endpoint study hemoglobin level variability . For determination variability , follow pattern hemoglobin level change establish : - Target range hemoglobin ( TRH ) : patient hemoglobin value range 11.0-12.0g/dl throughout study period . - Low hemoglobin ( LH ) : patient level 11.0g/dl - High hemoglobin ( HH ) : patient level 12.0g/dl - Low-amplitude fluctuation low hemoglobin ( LALH ) : patient least one measurement hemoglobin level < 11.0g/dl least one measurement range 11.0-12.0g/dl , without hemoglobin measurement > 12.0g/dl . - Low-amplitude fluctuation high hemoglobin ( LAHH ) : patient least one measurement hemoglobin level > 12.0g/dl least one measurement range 11.0-12.0g/dl , without hemoglobin measurement < 11.0g/dl . - High-amplitude fluctuation ( HAH ) : patient least one measurement hemoglobin level < 11.0g/dl least one measurement > 12.0g/dl . Secondary objective : - To determine potential factor influence hemoglobin variability . - To assess influence hemoglobin variability cardiovascular risk patient accord REGICOR function end study period .
